items.content_html: Dashify is a lightweight library for building customizable admin dashboards.
items.title: dashify-web/dashify: Dashify is a lightweight library for building customizable admin dashboards.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript library that simplifies the creation of structured data objects. It offers a type-safe and flexible API for defining and initializing classes with custom properties and behaviors, making it easier to manage complex data structures in TypeScript projects.
items.title: AndreyMork/domistrukt: A lightweight TypeScript library that simplifies the creation of structured data objects. It offers a type-safe and flexible API for defining and initializing classes with custom properties and behaviors, making it easier to manage complex data structures in TypeScript projects.

items.content_html: Drizzle ORM is a lightweight TypeScript-first ORM designed for optimal type safety and SQL query generation, making database interactions straightforward and reliable. It emphasizes simplicity and minimal runtime overhead, making it a good choice for modern TypeScript projects.
items.title: abhik1289/drizzle_learning:  Drizzle ORM is a lightweight TypeScript-first ORM designed for optimal type safety and SQL query generation, making database interactions straightforward and reliable. It emphasizes simplicity and minimal runtime overhead, making it a good choice for modern TypeScript projects.

items.content_html: KaliPHP is a fast, lightweight PHP framework. In an age where frameworks are a dime a dozen, We believe that KaliPHP will stand out in the crowd. It will do this by combining all the things you love about the great frameworks out there, while getting rid of the bad.
items.title: owner888/kaliphp: KaliPHP is a fast, lightweight PHP framework. In an age where frameworks are a dime a dozen, We believe that KaliPHP will stand out in the crowd. It will do this by combining all the things you love about the great frameworks out there, while getting rid of the bad.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient Inventory Management System that enables users to manage stock levels, track sales, and generate reports. Features include CRUD operations for inventory items, customer management, and export functionality. Built with modern web technologies to provide seamless and user-friendly interactions.
items.title: suhailabdaz/Stock-Ease: A lightweight and efficient Inventory Management System that enables users to manage stock levels, track sales, and generate reports. Features include CRUD operations for inventory items, customer management, and export functionality. Built with modern web technologies to provide seamless and user-friendly interactions.
